name: Rocky Stairs (Playdate)
description:
Welcome to the premier Third Person Endless Runner for Playdate!

Run your way up endless stairs in 8 levels and 2 super secret bonus modes.

Can you CRANK IT TILL YOU MAKE IT?

Features:
  • 3 Gameplay Modes
  • Dynamic Music
  • 2 Playable characters
  • Custom Animated Cutscenes
  • Accessibility Settings (including a Crankless Mode)
  • An all original Soundtrack by the one and only Austin Petilo 
  • A handmade Manual
  • 4 different enemy types
  • Funny (and sometimes helpful) quips
  • Collectibles
  • Stable 30 FPS on the device

And most importantly:

  • Tons of fun and replayability!

This game was created in the timespan of 3 days for PlayJam2 by PossiblyAxolotl. 

Rocky Stairs by PizzaDev, Austin Petilo, and The_LoFi_Boi.

The code, as well as assets used (except for 1 sound effect, the Playdate Button Icons, and the font, which are all specified in the credits), have been handcrafted during the jam period.

If you don't have a physical Playdate you can also play it using the SDK linked here!

Pricing:

This game is absolutely free for you to enjoy!

If you want to support us, and the hard work and love we put into this game, then there's an extended version of the soundtrack you can buy.

All profits made will be split between the 3 creators and directly fund the development of new games for the #Playdate!
